main_menu.text: What would you like to do with your pet?

feed_menu.text: Your pet looks at you expectantly. What would you like to feed them?

feed_healthy.text: You give your pet some nutritious food. They eat it gratefully and seem more energetic!

feed_premium.text: You treat your pet to premium food! They absolutely love it and bounce with joy!

feed_treats.text: Your pet enjoys the treats, but they're not very nutritious...

feed_snacks.text: The snacks make your pet happy for now, but they seem a bit sluggish afterwards.

feed_water.text: Your pet drinks the fresh water and seems refreshed!

play_menu.text: Your pet is ready to play! What activity catches your eye?

play_fetch.text: You throw a ball and your pet chases after it with enthusiasm! Great exercise!

play_fetch_more.text: Another round of fetch! Your pet is getting tired but still having fun.

play_tug.text: You engage in a spirited game of tug-of-war! Your pet's competitive spirit shines!

play_walk.text: You take your pet for a peaceful walk. The fresh air does you both good!

play_run.text: You run around together! Your pet loves the high-energy activity!

play_tricks.text: You spend time teaching your pet new tricks. They're a fast learner!

play_rest.text: You relax together quietly. Sometimes the best bonding happens in peaceful moments.

talk_menu.text: Your pet looks at you attentively, ready to listen. What's on your mind?

talk_funny.text: You tell your pet a hilarious story about your day. They seem to enjoy your animated gestures!

talk_funny_more.text: Another funny story! Your pet is clearly entertained by your storytelling.

talk_joke.text: You tell your pet a silly joke. They tilt their head in that adorable way!

talk_serious.text: You have a heart-to-heart conversation with your pet. They're such a good listener.

talk_feelings.text: You share your feelings with your pet, opening up about your day, your worries, and your hopes. Your pet listens attentively, their eyes full of understanding and compassion. There's something magical about the way they seem to truly comprehend your emotions, offering comfort without judgment. Their presence is incredibly soothing and supportive, making you feel less alone in the world.

talk_sing.text: You sing a little song to your pet. They seem to enjoy the melody!

talk_sing_more.text: You continue your impromptu concert! Your pet is your most appreciative audience.

talk_chat.text: You have a nice casual chat with your pet. They're great company!

care_menu.text: Time for some pet care! What would you like to do?

care_groom.text: You carefully groom your pet. They look and feel much better!

care_health.text: You check your pet's health. Taking preventive care is always wise!

care_rename.text: You've decided to give your pet a new name! They seem excited about their fresh identity.

care_resex.text: Your pet's gender identity has been updated! They seem comfortable with the change.

quit_game.text: Are you sure you want to quit? Your pet will miss you!

quit_confirm.text: Goodbye! Your pet has been saved and will be waiting for you when you return.
